heisig_story: To our way of counting directions, the west always comes fourth. So it is convenient to find the character for four in this kanji. But since we want only one of the four directions, the west adds the one at the top and sucks the human legs a bit out of their mouth in the process.

humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle has two glyphs, the first is like a bird‚Äôs nest, the original meaning is bird‚Äôs nest. The sun has set and the bird has entered the nest, so it is the first article of " Habitat " (Luo Zhenyu). Later, under the guise of being the West of East and West.

One said that the name " West " to sunset the sun is an extension of usage, not a purely false borrowing. The reason is that " West " was originally the bird's homing, and it is associated with the setting sun, so the name "Sunset" is called Xi (Du Xuezhi ). The second type of glyph is the phony of " fontaine ". The ancient sounds of " fontaine " and " west " have the same rhyme, so they are borrowed from each other and then gradually evolved into a western shape (Zhang Yujin, Ji Xusheng).

Jiajin inscriptions indicate the West of the West, and are also used as place names and palace names.

"Said Wen": "West, the bird is on the nest. Pictogram. The day is in the West and the bird dwells, so it is thought that the east is the west. All the genus of the west is from the west. The west, or from the wooden wife. Halogen, Lai Wenxi."
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle has two glyphs, the first is like a bird's nest, and its original meaning is bird's nest. The sun has set and the bird has entered the nest, so it is the first article of " Habitat " (Luo Zhenyu). Later, under the guise of being the West of East and West.

Direction, the side where the sun sets, opposite to "east": west. West sun. Western Regions. West. Xixi (the old honorific name for friends of the curtain or teachers of the school. In ancient times, the main seat was in the east, and the guest was in the west. Also known as "Xibin"). West Palace (by referring to concubines).
The style or method of things belongs to the West (mostly referring to European and American countries): Western learning. Western painting. Western food. Western medicine.

(1) The ancient word for "xi". The birds ceased.
(2) It is said that people are traveling. See "Xi Chi".
(3) Locality words. The direction of sunset, west.
(4) Go west; go west.
(5) Adverbs. Westward; westward.
(6) Refers to Western countries. Jin refers to Qin in the Spring and Autumn Period.
(7) The Song Dynasty refers to Xixia. See "Westerners". Modern refers to European and American countries. See "Westerners".
(8) Refers to the western sky. Those who believe in the Pure Land School of Buddhism refer to the Western Paradise in the Amitabha Sutra.
(9) The name of the ancient county. The former site was in the southwest of Tianshui City, Gansu Province.
(10) Last name. There was Xi Mingqi in the Ming Dynasty.
